faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How is a UAE family foundation different from a trust?
items.answer: While both are legal structures used to manage your wealth, a family foundation is a separate legal entity established for philanthropic purposes, whereas a trust is set up for the beneficiaries.

items.question: Can I set up a family trust in the UAE?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can set up family trusts in the UAE registered by the DIFC or ADGM.

items.question: Are there any tax benefits of setting up a family foundation in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants help you structure a tax-transparent foundation, empowering you to qualify for 0% income and inheritance tax.

items.question: What is the minimum amount I need to set up a family trust?
items.answer: No! You can create a trust as long as you have assets with some value that can be transferred.

items.question: How long does it take to establish a foundation or trust in the UAE?
items.answer: It generally takes 1-21 days, depending on your family dynamics, selected jurisdiction, and diversity of assets.
